abstract: Recent wave of Palestinian attacks on Israeli Jews are undermining already-waning confidence in Pres Mahmud Abbas; stagnating Palestinian institutions, along with polls showing that 65 percent of Palestinians favor the aging leader's resignation, have prompted open speculation about potential successors.
lead_paragraph: The aging Palestinian president, likened to a tree with leaves blowing off, rules ineffectively over a divided people and failing institutions.

headline.main: Talk Grows About Who Will Succeed Palestinians’ Fading Mahmoud Abbas
headline.print_headline: Talk Grows About Who Will Succeed Palestinians’ Aged Abbas, Seen as Ineffective

snippet: The aging Palestinian president, likened to a tree with leaves blowing off, rules ineffectively over a divided people and failing institutions.

keywords.value: Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine
